alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; Henrico; New Kent; Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 09 at 7:38PM EST until January 10 at 1:30AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Chesterfield County in central Virginia... Southeastern Henrico County in central Virginia... Northwestern Charles City County in east central Virginia... Northwestern New Kent County in east central Virginia... Northwestern Prince George County in south central Virginia... The City of Hopewell in south central Virginia... The Eastern City of Petersburg in south central Virginia... * Until 130 AM EST. * At 738 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Petersburg, Hopewell, Colonial Heights, Roxbury, Talleysville, Fort Gregg-Adams, Chester, Prince George, Jordans Point, Bottoms Bridge, Tunstall, Wayside, Glendale, Elko, Barnetts, Wrights Corner, Meadowville, Orapax Farms, Mountcastle and Jordan Point Country Club. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; Henrico; New Kent; Prince George
